name: The Beach Ball Game
description:
Experience the thrill of running away from a giant beach ball by controlling the participants in this ultimate beach party game.

The participants tag-in at the sound of an air horn and join the group to run away from the ball. When a participant is hit by the ball, they tag-out and wait for another opportunity to play.

With thanks to the following:

Music: ZapSplat, Dave Miles via zapsplat.com
Sound Fx: Blastwave FX, Sound Ex Machina, Epic Stock Media via zapsplat.com
Graphics: Ferocious Industries, 8bull, Kevin Iglesias, Sami Lehtonen, LowlyPoly via Unity Asset Store

This is my first Unity game (be kind!) and yes, the participants are all bald.
